AI Description: BamTools is a software toolkit for manipulating BAM (Binary Alignment Map) files. It provides both a C++ API for BAM file input and output, and a command-line tool for performing various operations on BAM files.
Core Features: Efficient Bam File Reading & Writing, Tools For Filtering, Sorting, Merging, Indexing Bam Files, Support For Extracting Regions, Statistics, & Alignments From Bam Files, Integration With Other Bioinformatics Tools
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Bam Files, Sequence Alignment, Toolkit
